body:
I ran `spack install tau` and got the following pile of errors:

    ==> Installing tau
    ==> Using cached archive: /home/dror/spack/var/spack/cache/tau/tau-2.27.1.tar.gz
    ==> Staging archive: /home/dror/spack/var/spack/stage/tau-2.27.1-bqpht5jbgj2aao7bv3vvs7lar2lyvnbw/tau-2.27.1.tar.gz
    ==> Created stage in /home/dror/spack/var/spack/stage/tau-2.27.1-bqpht5jbgj2aao7bv3vvs7lar2lyvnbw
    ==> No patches needed for tau
    ==> Building tau [Package]
    ==> Executing phase: 'install'
    ==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
        'make' '-j8' 'install'

    10 errors found in build log:

     89      Copy /tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/tools/src/contrib/CubeReader.j
            ar to /home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/tau-2.27.1-bqpht5jbg
            j2aao7bv3vvs7lar2lyvnbw/x86_64/lib
     90     ====================================================
     91     ... done
     92     ***********************************************************************
    >> 93     grep: ./utils/FixMakefile.info: No such file or directory
    >> 94     grep: ./utils/FixMakefile.sed: No such file or directory
     95     NOTE: Saving configuration environment to /tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2
            .27.1/.configure_env/258794744e2942facc2c02d8985d8b39
     ...
     224    make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/example
            s/pi'
     225    Makefile:16: /tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/x86_64/lib/Makefile.tau
            -communicators-phase-mpi-pdt-openmp: No such file or directory
    >> 226    make[1]: *** No rule to make target '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1
            /x86_64/lib/Makefile.tau-communicators-phase-mpi-pdt-openmp'.  Stop.
     227    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/examples
            /pi'
     ...
     234    make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/example
            s/autoinstrument'
     235    Makefile:16: /tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/x86_64/lib/Makefile.tau
            -communicators-phase-mpi-pdt-openmp: No such file or directory
    >> 236    make[1]: *** No rule to make target '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1
            /x86_64/lib/Makefile.tau-communicators-phase-mpi-pdt-openmp'.  Stop.
     237    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/examples
            /autoinstrument'
     238    make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/example
            s/reduce'
     239    Makefile:16: /tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/x86_64/lib/Makefile.tau
            -communicators-phase-mpi-pdt-openmp: No such file or directory
    >> 240    make[1]: *** No rule to make target '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1
            /x86_64/lib/Makefile.tau-communicators-phase-mpi-pdt-openmp'.  Stop.
     241    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/examples
            /reduce'
     242    touch .clean
     ...
     847    make[2]: Entering directory '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/src/Pro
            file'
     848    Installing libTauMpi-communicators-phase-mpi-pdt-openmp.a in /home/dror/spack/opt/spack/
            linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/tau-2.27.1-bqpht5jbgj2aao7bv3vvs7lar2lyvnbw/x86_64/li
            b
     849    if [ -d /home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/tau-2.27.1-bqpht5j
            bgj2aao7bv3vvs7lar2lyvnbw/x86_64/lib ] ; then true; \
     850                       else mkdir /home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.
            3.0/tau-2.27.1-bqpht5jbgj2aao7bv3vvs7lar2lyvnbw/x86_64/lib ;fi
     851    /bin/cp libTauMpi-communicators-phase-mpi-pdt-openmp.a /home/dror/spack/opt/spack/linux-
            ubuntu18.04-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/tau-2.27.1-bqpht5jbgj2aao7bv3vvs7lar2lyvnbw/x86_64/lib
     852    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/src/Prof
            ile'
    >> 853    /usr/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-ld: cannot find -liberty
    >> 854    /usr/bin/x86_64-linux-gnu-ld: cannot find -lz
    >> 855    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
     856    Makefile:403: recipe for target 'libTAUsh-communicators-phase-mpi-pdt-openmp.so' failed
    >> 857    make[1]: *** [libTAUsh-communicators-phase-mpi-pdt-openmp.so] Error 1
     858    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/dror/spack-stage/spack-stage-tqsVdd/tau-2.27.1/src/Prof
            ile'
     859    Makefile:177: recipe for target 'install' failed
    >> 860    make: *** [install] Error 2
title: Errors installing tau on linux-ubuntu18.04-x86_64
